channel.title: I need help with Restarting my server
channel.description: After I edit something in my server while players are online, then compiling it. I have to turn my server off to compile, then put it online. but that hurts the online percentage for sites like runelocus, or the status page for this one. Is there a way where I can compile and not turn my server off, maybe just restart it or something like that?

item.title: I need help with Restarting my server
item.dc:creator: @pj3r_b4rr4q3 pj3r b4rr4q3
item.description:
@pj3r_b4rr4q3 wrote:

i just do… the command:: update 30(seconds) compile while this time and close source and open takes 1 sec

Read full topic
item.source: I need help with Restarting my server

item.title: I need help with Restarting my server
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

no… make a ::restart command, which saves the players when you use it. I’ll give you half of my ::restart, but you have to finish it.
It’s pretty simple.

if(playerCommand.startsWith("restart")) { PlayerSave.saveGame((Client)p); } }

Read full topic
item.source: I need help with Restarting my server
